description: After a healthier alternative to cinnamon scrolls? Try this nutritionally approved apple filo scroll recipe where flaky pastry meets thinly sliced cinnamon apples.
name: Healthier Apple Filo Scrolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange apples slices, overlapping along top long edge of pastry strips, just slightly overhanging (apples will slide out slightly when you roll the pastry). Sprinkle with cinnamon. Fold pastry in half widthways to cover bottoms of apples. Roll pastry to form a scroll and place on tray. Bake for 15 minutes or until pastry is golden. Drizzle apple roses with maple syrup to serve.
